headline: Viatris (VTRS) Announces Positive Top-line Results from VEGA-3
summary: Viatris Inc. (NASDAQ:VTRS) is one of the Most Undervalued Stocks Under $10 to Buy Now. The company announced positive top-line results from VEGA-3, which is the second pivotal Phase 3 trial evaluating MR-141 (phentolamine ophthalmic solution 0.75%) in treating presbyopia. To give a brief overview, presbyopia happens to be a progressive loss of the ability to […]

headline: Q1 Earnings Highs And Lows: Viatris (NASDAQ:VTRS) Vs The Rest Of The Generic Pharmaceuticals Stocks
summary: The end of the earnings season is always a good time to take a step back and see who shined (and who not so much). Let’s take a look at how generic pharmaceuticals stocks fared in Q1, starting with Viatris (NASDAQ:VTRS).
